Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Nordica
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Oak Park, Addison, Harlem and Belmont due to fire department activity near Belmont/Nordica.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Oak Park, Addison, Harlem and Belmont due to fire department activity near Belmont/Nordica.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
